title: CalendarPlusAi
description:
A simple, minimalistic and straight-forward personal calendar creator with AI. No sign-up mail required. 
The app will let you create a personalized calendar that'll take in account your availability and any special requests. Then you can perfect the calendar with your final editing and export it to your calendar app (Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, Microsoft Outlook, etc...), PDF or receive a beautiful daily newsletter with your daily tasks, reminders (and more!) written.
